channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Doc Shows Garland, Wray, And Monaco All Over Corrupt ‘Arctic Frost’
item.description: 'This investigation unleashed unchecked govt power at the highest levels. My oversight will continue,' Sen. Grassley wrote on X.

item.title: The Week: Trump’s Ballroom Blitz
item.description: Plus: Baseball has never seen quite the likes of Shohei Ohtani.

item.title: After Losing At SCOTUS, Wisconsin Finds A New Way To ‘Target’ Catholic Charities
item.description: Wisconsin is seeking to deny a tax exemption not only to the CCB, but to all such religious and nonreligious organizations across the state.

item.title: Big Government Locks Young People Out of the American Dream
item.description: Socialism, regulation, and other government policies are what have caused the affordability crisis that has arisen across the United States.

item.title: How Leftist Think Tanks Twist Facts To Manipulate Congress On Obamacare
item.description: Groups on the left know full well that allowing the enhanced subsidies to expire as scheduled wouldn’t cause a catastrophe for most families.

item.title: Trump Should Drop His Damages Claim Against DOJ
item.description: An ethical conflict that can only be resolved by acting ethically.

item.title: Trump Should Stop Sharing Intel With The U.K. Until It Punishes Chinese Espionage
